section_title: DETERMINATION OF A QUANTIFIED EMISSION REDUCTION COMMITMENT FOR BELARUS
sentences: Informal consultations were convened by Andrej Kranjc (Slovenia).
At least one negotiating group raised concerns that an amendment to the Protocol would be needed for Belarus to become an Annex B Party.
enb_long_title: Eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties to the Climate Change Convention and first meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol
